mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEETINGROOM (ROOM_NUM, START, END, DEPT, USER_ID, BOOK_DATE, USER_NAME, TITLE) VALUES ( #{room_num}, #{start}, #{end}, #{dept}, #{user_id}, #{book_date}, #{user_name}, #{title})
mapper.select: SELECT CONCAT(DEPT, ' ', TITLE) TITLE, CONCAT(BOOK_DATE,' ',START) START, CONCAT(BOOK_DATE,' ',END) END, ROOM_NUM, BOOK_DATE, DEPT, IDX FROM MEETINGROOM WHERE ROOM_NUM = #{room_num}
SELECT idx, room_num, start, end, dept, user_id, book_date, user_name, title FROM MEETINGROOM WHERE BOOK_DATE >= NOW()
